name: Domino Baby Blanket
description: Inspired by the beautiful blankets I saw online and with a basket full of very small scraps of my hand-dyed yarns, I made my own version of a pattern that has already been written and passed on by many. By combining the often busier, speckled yarn with a solid color as a base, it becomes a peaceful whole. Described here as a baby blanket but you can make the blanket as small or as big as you want and also from any yarn/yarn thickness. Let your imagination run wild and knit your own unique domino blanket!
suggested_yarn: Wol met Verve Merino Twist Sock
full_text: Inspired by the beautiful blankets I saw online and with a basket full of very small scraps of my hand-dyed yarns, I made my own version of a pattern that has already been written and passed on by many. By combining the often busier, speckled yarn with a solid color as a base, it becomes a peaceful whole. Described here as a baby blanket but you can make the blanket as small or as big as you want and also from any yarn/yarn thickness. Let your imagination run wild and knit your own unique domino blanket! Main color: 2 skeins undyed Wol met Verve Merino Twist Sock (100g/ 365m, 80% Merino - 20% nylon Contrast color(s): 11 mini’s, Merino Twist Sock, 20g/73m) 80% merino - 20% nylon This quantity is sufficient for a baby blanket as shown in the photos, size approximately 80x80 cm. Photo’s by Koelmagazine
